net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api

Interface UiContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiContext, AbstractUiContextImpl, UiContextGwt, UiContextImpl, UiContextTestImpl

    public interface UiContext
    This is the interface for the context of the UI. In various places you can use CDI (Context and Dependency Injection) to get access to arbitrary components. Even though this is still a recommended pattern also for clients there are some limitations (lack of features on platforms like web). Further, clients have smaller components created with new for simplicity. Injecting Providers for this would make the programming much more complex. In such cases you need to pass required components manually. This context is a container to make this easy and maintainable.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • getConfiguration

        UiConfiguration getConfiguration()
        This method gets the UiConfiguration for this factory. It is intended to be read by UiWidget implementations to configure their look and feel.
        Returns:
        the UiConfiguration.
